checkmate.logic.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • checkmate.logic.game.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Player object for the chess game.
    Author:
    llmlks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(String c)
      Constructor generates empty ArrayList for pieces and assigns value c to colour.

      Return this player's king, or null if there isn't one.

      Returns players pieces as an ArrayList.
